metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16808 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
tcpdump before 4.9.3 has a heap-based buffer over-read related to aoe_printin print-aoe.c and lookup_emem in addrtoname.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16808` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
